# stbillcustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("stbillcustomer")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stwaybill_tmp
AS
SELECT
    lms_waybill_loadid
    ,count(distinct lms_waybill_delivercustid) as lms_loadparent_nodeliverycustomers
    ,sum(CASE 
        WHEN lms_customer_billcustgrouptypedescription = 'Express' Then 1
        ELSE 0
    END) as lms_loadparent_expressdelivercustomers
    ,sum(CASE 
        WHEN lms_customer_billcustgrouptypedescription <> 'Express' Then 1
        ELSE 0
    END) as lms_loadparent_retailelivercustomers


FROM stwaybill w
LEFT JOIN stbillcustomer bc on bc.lms_customer_id =w.lms_waybill_billcust
GROUP BY lms_waybill_loadid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
rptloadparentlevel
AS
SELECT
    lp.lms_loadparent_parentloadid
    ,lp.lms_loadparent_ldate
    ,lp.orv_dispatch_estdepdate as lms_loadparent_estdepdate
    ,lp.orv_dispatch_originalstartdate as lms_loadparent_originalstartdate
    ,concat_ws(",",collect_list(lc.lms_loadchild_id)) as lms_loadparent_childloadids
    -- ,explode(collect_set(lc.lms_loadchild_id)) as lms_loadparent_loadchildids
    ,fl.id as lms_loadparent_locationfromid
    ,fl.description as lms_loadparent_locationfromdescription
    ,tl.id as lms_loadparent_locationtoid
    ,tl.description as lms_loadparent_locationtodescription
    ,v.md_vehicle_id as lms_loadparent_vehcileid
    ,v.md_vehicle_uid as lms_loadparent_vehcileuid
    ,v.md_vehicle_fleetcode as lms_loadparent_vehcilefleetcode
    ,v.md_vehicle_registrationnumber as lms_loadparent_vehicleregistrationnumber
    ,v.md_vehicle_internalvolume as lms_loadparent_vehicleinternalvolume
    ,lp.lms_loadparent_vehodo as lms_loadparent_lmsvehodo
    ,lp.lms_loadparent_vehodo2 as lms_loadparent_lmsvehodo2
    ,(lp.lms_loadparent_vehodo2 - lp.lms_loadparent_vehodo) as lms_loadparent_lmsodokms
    ,orv_dispatch_startodo as lms_loadparent_orvstartodo
    ,orv_dispatch_stopodo as lms_loadparent_orvstopodo
    ,(orv_dispatch_stopodo - orv_dispatch_startodo) as lms_loadparent_orvodokms
    ,orv_dispatch_distance as lms_loadparent_orvdistance
    ,orv_dispatch_duration  as lms_loadparent_orvduration
    ,w.lms_loadparent_nodeliverycustomers 
    ,w.lms_loadparent_expressdelivercustomers
    ,w.lms_loadparent_retailelivercustomers
    ,sum(lms_loadparent_aggrnoparcels) as lms_loadparent_noparcels
    ,sum(lms_loadparent_aggrweight )as lms_loadparent_weight
    ,sum(lms_loadparent_aggrchargeweight) as lms_loadparent_chargeweight
    ,count(lc.lms_loadchild_id) as lms_loadparent_nochildloads



FROM stloadparent lp
LEFT JOIN stloadchild lc on lc.lms_loadchild_parentloadid = lp.lms_loadparent_parentloadid
LEFT JOIN dbolocation fl on fl.id = lms_loadchild_fromlocid and lc.lms_loadchild_parentloadid = lp.lms_loadparent_parentloadid
LEFT JOIN dbolocation tl on tl.id = lms_loadchild_tolocid and lc.lms_loadchild_parentloadid = lp.lms_loadparent_parentloadid
LEFT JOIN stmdvehicle v on v.md_vehicle_orvid = orv_dispatch_vid
LEFT JOIN stwaybill_tmp w on w.lms_waybill_loadid = lc.lms_loadchild_id


WHERE lms_loadparent_ldate >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||(month(current_date()))||'-'||'01'))

GROUP BY 
    lp.lms_loadparent_parentloadid
    ,lp.lms_loadparent_ldate
    ,lp.orv_dispatch_estdepdate
    ,lp.orv_dispatch_originalstartdate 
    ,fl.id
    ,fl.description
    ,tl.id
    ,tl.description
    ,v.md_vehicle_id
    ,v.md_vehicle_uid
    ,v.md_vehicle_fleetcode
    ,v.md_vehicle_registrationnumber
    ,v.md_vehicle_internalvolume
    ,lp.lms_loadparent_vehodo
    ,lp.lms_loadparent_vehodo2
    ,orv_dispatch_startodo
    ,orv_dispatch_stopodo
    ,orv_dispatch_distance
    ,orv_dispatch_duration
    ,w.lms_loadparent_nodeliverycustomers 
    ,w.lms_loadparent_expressdelivercustomers
    ,w.lms_loadparent_retailelivercustomers

    
order by lms_loadparent_parentloadid desc
